text: Just caught up with @EnvAgencyNW #Cumbria and #Lancashire incident teams. We are watching rain and rivers closely over next few hours and doing essential maintenance to keep rivers flowing.  Sadly some people have had their properties flooded and my thoughts are with them https://t.co/LpWSCxScua

Yep. Tonight there are teams out from @LancasterCC @LancashireCC @LancashireFRS @PoliceLancaster @EnvAgencyNW @ElectricityNW 
Can't stop the rain. 
But can try and reduce the impact on residents and businesses. https://t.co/Dg7KFX7b1V
